Chia-Dashboard-Satellite
======

[![Software License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-GPL--3.0-brightgreen.svg?style=flat-square)](LICENSE)
[![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/chia-dashboard-satellite.svg?style=flat-square)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/chia-dashboard-satellite)
[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/582180216747720723.svg?label=Discord&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://discord.gg/gNHhn9y)

## Prerequisites

- nodejs >= 16, see [here](https://docs.foxypool.io/general/guides/installing-nodejs/) how to install it

## Getting started

Check out the [Docs](https://docs.foxypool.io/chia-dashboard-satellite/).

## Setup

```bash
npm i -g chia-dashboard-satellite
chia-dashboard-satellite
```

## Updating the satellite

```bash
npm update -g chia-dashboard-satellite
```
